task_summary: The robot pours liquid from a cup into a mug. The sequence involves locating the mug, approaching above it, performing the pouring action with the cup, and then retreating.

task_long_description.overview: This episode features a stationary robot arm on a workbench pouring liquid from a cup into a mug. The arm first locates the mug (if not visible), then moves above it with the cup in its grasp. Pouring is initiated by tilting the cup to a set angle above the mug. After the liquid transfer, the arm retreats from the mug, marking episode completion. Accuracy and spill avoidance are important, and the robot re-acquires the mug if visibility fails.
preconditions: Cup is held by the robot gripper.
Mug is present and reachable on the table.
Pour trajectory is clear of obstructions.
stepwise_plan: Tilt and pour from cup into mug.
success_criteria: Liquid is successfully transferred from cup to mug without spillage.
Cup is sufficiently emptied above the mug.
Robot arm avoids collision with table and mug.
failure_and_recovery: Mug not detected: perform detection subroutine.
Pour misaligned: abort and retry if possible.
Obstruction detected: halt sequence, clear path.
task_long_description.termination: Sequence ends when pouring completes and the arm has retreated.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the mug is visible to the robot sensors.
Triggers perception to detect mug location if not previously visible.
Moves the grasped cup above the mug with a sufficient clearance for pouring.
Executes the pouring operation, tilting the cup above the mug.
Moves the arm away from the mug after pouring completes.

recovery_strategy: Retry object detection when mug not visible
Abort and safely reposition arm after spillage or collision
assumptions: Instruction does not specify cup source; inferred from frames.
No force/tolerance/pour amount specified; using default or null.
Cup is already grasped at episode start.

expected_success_criteria: Mug is identified and pour initiated above its opening
Cup is tilted to allow liquid transfer at designated angle
Liquid reaches mug with minimal spillage
